title: Book Bite #4: Is Your Inner Child Your Truest Self?
description:
Today, at #4 in our countdown of last year’s most popular book bites, “The Child in You” by Stefanie Stahl.
Is your inner child your truest self? Clinical psychologist Stefanie Stahl thinks so, as do the one-and-a-half million readers who have snapped up her book. But sometimes childhood traumas, big and small, can keep us from becoming happy, fulfilled adults. In this book, Stefanie uses examples and exercises to guide readers through a process of working through past injuries to become more alive — and childlike — in the present.
